ValidationRule.description: Prohibits from changing of the orders that have "Order Reviewed" checked.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Order_Reviewed__c = True, OR( ISCHANGED(of_products__c), ISCHANGED(Sum_of_quantities__c), ISCHANGED(MRR__c), ISCHANGED(One_off__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Products cannot be changed on reviewed orders. Please contact the Finance team.
